Class RestletThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi.RestletThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RestletThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread that runs the RESTLET server for Gateway API.

    sulfo
